item.title: Benchmark chunks in Rmd
item.description: Implementation Test Question Tip In order to benchmark chunks, I implemented a hook for Rmd’s chunk which works as if Jupyter Notebook’s %%timeit command. Implementation A simple benchmark is done by saving proc.time() before running code and subtract the value from new proc.time() after code runs. t <- proc.time()['elapsed'] invisible(runif(100)) proc.time()['elapsed'] - t ## elapsed ## 0.006 However, hooks are functions, and bodies of functions are evaluated in different environments every time.
